gdpr: Privacy Policy 1. Data We Collect When you register or use our services, we may collect the following data: - Account Information: Username, email address, and password. - Gameplay Data: Match history, scores, and in-game preferences. - Chat Data: Messages exchanged in the chat feature. - Technical Information: IP address, browser type, and device information for troubleshooting and analytics. 2. Why We Collect Your Data We collect your data to: - Provide and improve our multiplayer gaming experience. - Facilitate chat functionality between players. - Maintain the security and functionality of our services. - Analyze usage trends and enhance user experience. - Send important updates regarding the site (only with your consent). 3. Legal Basis for Processing We process your data under the following legal bases: - Performance of a Contract: To allow you to play games and use site features. - Consent: For sending newsletters or marketing materials. - Legitimate Interest: To ensure the security and proper functioning of our platform. 4. How Your Data is Stored We store your data securely and only for as long as necessary: - Account and gameplay data are stored for the duration of your account. - Chat data is retained for moderation purposes and deleted after 30 days. - Technical logs are retained for 90 days for troubleshooting. 5. Sharing of Data We do not sell or rent your data. However, we may share your data with: - Service Providers: Hosting, analytics, and payment processing providers. - Legal Authorities: If required by law or to protect our rights. 6. Your Rights As per GDPR, you have the following rights: - Access: Request a copy of your personal data. - Correction: Update inaccurate or incomplete data. - Deletion: Request to delete your account and associated data. - Objection: Restrict certain types of processing (e.g., marketing). - Portability: Obtain a copy of your data in a machine-readable format. - Withdraw Consent: For marketing and optional data collection, at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us at [email@example.com]. 7. Cookies and Tracking We use cookies for: - Maintaining user sessions during gameplay. - Saving your preferences. - Analyzing website usage to improve functionality. You can manage cookie settings through your browser. 8. Data Security We implement industry-standard measures to protect your data. However, no method of online storage or transmission is 100% secure. 9. International Data Transfers If your data is transferred outside the EU, we ensure it complies with GDPR by using Standard Contractual Clauses or transferring to countries with adequacy decisions. 10. Contact Us For any GDPR-related inquiries, please reach out to us: Email: [email@example.com] Data Protection Officer: [DPO Name, if applicable]
consentText: I consent to the processing of my personal data for account creation and service delivery as outlined in the Privacy Policy.
